features: TRANSFORM YOUR LAUNDRY ROUTINE — Clorox Scentiva dryer sheets will leave your favorite tee, bedsheets, towels, and more soft and comfy and infused with long-lasting, uplifting scents
ELEVATED SCENT — Clorox Scentiva scents are carefully curated to be well-balanced and inviting blends that will freshen and transform your home
WRINKLE REDUCTION — Clorox Scentiva fabric softening sheets work to help reduce wrinkles and reduce the need for ironing
CONTROL STATIC CLING — These fabric softening dryer sheets control static, preventing your clothes from sticking to you and each other
HOW TO REUSE SHEETS AROUND THE HOUSE — Try inserting the fabric softening dryer sheets into your shoes or layer them between folded clothes for an added refreshing scent
body.description: Indulge your home with Clorox Scentiva. Clorox Scentiva will keep your household clean while filling your home with uplifting, inviting, and long-lasting scents. Scentiva fragrances are carefully curated to freshen and invigorate your home and transform your cleaning experience. Clorox Scentiva Fabric Softening Dryer Sheets contain 105 dryer sheets for use in your dryer and around the home.DIRECTIONS: Load clothes in the dryer. Set controls as usual. Always use low or recommended heat settings. Place one new sheet on top of the load. Start dryer. Remove and discard used sheet when you take out the dry clothes. If spotting should occur, wet fabric, rub spot with pure bar soap, then rinse and rewash item. If two loads are dried in an extra large capacity dryer, use two dryer sheets. Ingredients include fabric softening agents and perfume blended on a non-woven fabric. WARNING: Keep out of reach of children. Not for use on garments labeled as flame resistant as it may reduce flame resistance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clorox Scentiva Laundry Products in Tuscan Lavender & Jasmine Scent A lavish, yet delicate balance of vibrant lavender and jasmine petals. Clorox Scentiva Laundry Products will leave your favorite tee, bedsheets, and towels feeling soft and smelling wonderful. These laundry products go a long way in preventing stiff laundry and infusing it with uplifting, long-lasting scents. They also control static, preventing your clothes from sticking to you and your laundry.

Indulge your home Clorox Scentiva scents are carefully curated to be well-balanced and made with inviting blends that will freshen and transform your home. Softer, more touchable laundry Leaves your favorite tee, bedsheets, and towel soft, comfy, and ready for instant use. Say 'Goodbye' to static Controls static, preventing your clothes from sticking to you and each other, so you can enjoy your clothes and the delightful scent that these products leave behind. Less wrinkles means less ironing Works to help reduce wrinkles. No longer do you have to spend every morning tethered to your iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very picky about fragrance and I wasn’t sure, but these smell really nice and I’m so glad that I purchased them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s okay but scent doesn’t last long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sheets smell really good. They reduce static. Only thing I wasn't happy with is that the smell doesn't last long on the clothes. Other than that they are good. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, softens laundry. Good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: I just got a brand new washer & dryer (shout out to my almost in-laws).. when I do my own laundry, which I am now finally able to do, I do not skimp on dryer sheets because I LOVE them!They just give all of your clothes and blankets and towels an extra freshness-plus no static cling. These smell wonderful and I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Scent is great on the sheet it self but it the fragrance does not appear on the clothes at all!
reviews.reviewText: The scent of this fabric softener completely disappears in the dryer. It serves no purpose other than to soften the clothes. I thought it would make my towels and pajamas smell like lavender but I had no such luck. Very softening, however, and the price is competitive and favorable indeed. I also noticed that the sheets were a little bit shorter and not as thick as some other popular brands. I adored the smell and only wish it lasted longer. This definitely wasn't due to the laundry itself because it wasn't very soiled or unclean to begin with. The flap to open and close the box isn't very tight and could be formulated to tuck the box more tightly together so that the sheets stay fresh and free of any dust or moisture in your laundry room or else from the laundromat you're visiting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It smells amazing keeps clothes fresh!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Lo puse en mi secadora y no olió nada, no sé si tenga que ver que es eléctrica y no de gas pero le eché hasta dos y no olí diferencia =(
Really nice but you need to use 3 or 4 sheets to get the scent in your clothes.
